description: Property-style Merkle tests: determinism, odd-carry rule, tree height for N=1..25
notes: This fixture tests Merkle tree properties with 25 leaves. The implementation must: (1) produce deterministic roots, (2) apply odd-carry rule (duplicate last leaf) when leaf count is odd, (3) compute correct tree height. Leaf inputs follow format: 'test_cert_{i}:deadbeef{i:04x}:PASS'.
